title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Core JavaScript concepts including variables, data types, and basic operations

questions.question: What is the correct way to declare a variable in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: The 'var' keyword is used to declare variables in JavaScript.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a JavaScript data type?
questions.explanation: JavaScript has string, number, boolean, undefined, null, and object types, but not character.

questions.question: What will console.log(typeof null) output?
questions.explanation: typeof null returns 'object' due to a historical bug in JavaScript.

hints: Make sure the variable name matches in both places
